UIHelper - Class in com.example.mapnector.UserInterface
This class is holding most of the views(except of the create group ones and mail system) that are shown in MapsActivity on the main screen + left listView.
UIHelper(Activity) - Constructor for class com.example.mapnector.UserInterface.UIHelper
Here we initialize the views, the SlidingPaneLayout(of mail system) and bind onClickListeners of the views to the MapsActivity
UIHelper.JoinLeaveBtnType - Enum in com.example.mapnector.UserInterface
Specifies what button is btnJoinLeaveGroup now; It is the same button that used for joining, leaving and requesting to join groups
updateGroupSettings(Group) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.GroupManagement.LVHelper
show dialog to update group settings(same one as for creating group just with disabled fields)
updateJoinLeaveBtn(UIHelper.JoinLeaveBtnType) - Method in class com.example.mapnector.UserInterface.UIHelper

updateMapType() - Method in class com.example.mapnector.MapManagement.MapManager
we get there when UpdateMap in menu in MapsActivity is clicked - move to the next map type in the hierarchy
